allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete Polymarket Dart SDK implementation

Implement comprehensive Dart SDK for Polymarket prediction market APIs:

- Gamma API: Events, markets, tags, comments, profiles, search, series, sports
- CLOB API: Order book, pricing, orders, trades with L2 authentication  
- Data API: Positions, trades, activity, holders, portfolio value, leaderboard
- WebSocket: Real-time CLOB and RTDS streams with auto-reconnect
- Authentication: L1 \(EIP-712 placeholder\) and L2 \(HMAC-SHA256\) support
- 25+ type-safe models with JSON serialization via json_serializable
- 15 enums for order types, activity types, leaderboard windows, etc.
- Custom exception hierarchy with Result type for error handling
- 4 comprehensive examples: basic, websocket, trading, market discovery
- Full documentation in README and CHANGELOG

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add MIT LICENSE and rename docs to doc

- Add MIT License file for open-source compliance
- Rename docs/ to doc/ to follow Dart package layout convention

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
